full_description:
Baseus Bowie U2 Neckband Wireless Earphone

Baseus Bowie U2 Neckband Wireless Earphone offers an immersive and high-quality sound experience. With the latest technology and advanced features, these earphones are designed to take your listening experience to the next level. The Baseus Bowie U2 Neckband Wireless Earphones feature Hybrid ANC technology, which incorporates dual-feed noise cancellation to effectively reduce background noise and deliver clear, high-quality sound. The Transparency Mode is a convenient feature that allows you to clearly capture ambient sound without having to remove the earphones, making conversations and situational awareness more accessible. The Advanced Wireless Bluetooth 5.2 technology enables a stable and independent connection between the left and right earphones, ensuring seamless and synchronized audio transmission. Baseus Bowie U2 is equipped with Titanized Composite Diaphragm Speakers to provide a balanced all-frequency audio experience, delivering premium HD sound quality for an immersive and engaging listening experience. The Baseus Bowie U2 Neckband offers low latency mode, which allows for AV synchronization and audio smoothness, providing a seamless and uninterrupted audio experience. The neckband design offers a comfortable and secure fit that is perfect for extended listening sessions.

full_description:
Baseus Bowie U2 Pro Neckband Noise-Cancellation Wireless Earphone

The Baseus Bowie U2 Pro Neckband Noise-Cancellation Wireless Earphone is equipped with a hybrid ANC (active noise cancellation) technology, which can reduce background noise for clear sound. The Baseus Bowie U2 Pro earphone supports a transparency mode that helps you hear ambient sound without taking off the earphone. The Baseus Wireless Neckband Earphone features advanced wireless connectivity with Bluetooth 5.2 technology; it's an independent and synchronized connection for left and right earphones. The Baseus Bowie U2 Pro Neckband also has titanized composite diaphragm speakers, which can offer a balanced all-frequency audio experience with premium HD sound quality. The Baseus Bowie U2 Pro Neckband Wireless Earphone is also equipped with a Baseus dual channel for low latency, which can enable low latency mode to enjoy AV synchronization and audio smoothness in gaming sessions. The Baseus Bowie U2 Pro Wireless Neckband features a hip and chic design for sport, with class-A noise cancellation certified by the China Audio Industry Association and the China Electronics Standardization Institute. The Wireless Neckband earphone also has a 4-mic ENC (environmental noise cancellation) for clear calls, which can filter out the wind and other noises and enhance your voice quality. The earphone also has a 0.038s low latency optimal gaming experience, which can ensure your audio is in sync with the visual.

title: Baseus Bowie P1x Half-In-ear Neckband Earphone
cat_seo_title: Baseus Neckband Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Baseus Neckband at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest Baseus Bluetooth Wireless Neckband Earphone available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery in BD.
full_description:
Baseus Bowie P1x Half-In-ear Neckband Earphone

The Baseus Bowie P1x Half-In-ear Neckband Earphone is skillfully designed to satisfy the demands of dynamic people who value durability and great sound quality in their music players. This neckband earphone is made of a sturdy blend of materials, including aluminum, PC, ABS, and silica gel, and it is intended to be both resilient and comfortable. With its flexible and lightweight neckband, the user may use the earphones for lengthy periods without experiencing discomfort. This ensures that the earphones stay in place during strenuous activities like jogging or exercises. Equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.3 technology, the Baseus Bowie P1x offers users a flawless wireless experience with a strong and stable connection that extends up to 10 meters. This advanced connectivity is complemented by an ultra-low latency of just 0.06 seconds, ensuring that video and audio are perfectly synchronized, which is particularly beneficial for watching movies or playing video games where timing is crucial. The Baseus Bowie P1x neckband offers an impressive 25 hours of continuous music playback on a single charge, ideal for long travel days or extended training sessions. The earphones can be fully recharged in just about 1.5 hours, and the package includes a micro USB cable for convenient charging, ensuring you spend less time tethered to a power outlet and more time enjoying your music. Sound quality is paramount with the Baseus Bowie P1x. It has 10-millimeter drivers that produce a rich, detailed sound profile. The bass is deep and robust, the midranges are clear and well-defined, and the highs are crisp and resonant, allowing users to hear every nuance in their favorite tracks. Whether it’s the subtle strum of a guitar, a complex classical piece, or the pulsating beat of an electronic track, these earphones deliver high-fidelity sound that enhances any musical genre. The earphones have a simple-to-use remote control built into the neckband for increased convenience. Without having to physically touch their mobile device, users can easily control playback, answer or reject calls, engage in game mode, adjust volume, and use the voice assistant function using this remote. In particular, this hands-free control comes in handy when working out or when your smartphone is out of reach. The Baseus Bowie P1x Neckband Earphones are made for people who expect their listening equipment to be comfortable, long-lasting, and high-performing. They are a great option for anybody who requires dependable, high-quality music on the road, from casual listeners to audio enthusiasts.
